item.title: A Combinatorial Proof of Binet's Formula
item.description: library(‘knitr’) Binet’s Formula The Binet’s formula is also known as the explicit expression of n-th term of Fibbonacci Sequence. See the proof as follows: In here I should insert my pdf document. still figuring our how to use knitr.
